verbose_text: We found that IFNgamma inhibits multiple Th17 related molecules in WT CD4 T cells including IL-17A, IL-17F, RORgammat, and IL-21 in a dosage dependent manner, indicating IFNgamma has a global suppressive effect on Th17 differentiation (XREF_FIG).
evidence: IFNgamma inhibits multiple Th17-related molecules in WT CD4
